name: E-Commerce Storefront
description: Responsive e-commerce site with product filters, search, and cart system. Integrated dummy product API using React hooks and component architecture.

name: Portfolio Website
description: Personal portfolio with animations and responsive design. Built with Next.js static generation and Tailwind CSS for clean UI.

name: Chat App
description: Real-time chat application with room-based conversations. Used Express server, Socket.IO, and MongoDB for message storage.

name: Weather App
description: Weather dashboard with live stats and city search. Implemented async data fetching with Axios and error handling.

name: Task Manager
description: CRUD-based task manager with RESTful API backend and React state management for UI updates.

name: Blog Platform
description: Markdown-based blog with dynamic routing. Integrated file-based routing and MDX support for content-driven design.
